Generated Narrative: ValueSet ndhm-productorservice

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 387713003 (Surgical procedure (procedure))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 305056002 (Admission procedure)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 43741000 (Site of care)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 285201006 (Hospital environment)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 63653004 (Medical device)
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 440654001 (Inpatient environment (environment))
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 440655000 (Outpatient environment (environment))

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    387713003Surgical procedure (procedure)
    63653004Biomedical device (physical object)
    305056002Admission procedure (procedure)
    43741000Site of care (environment)
